title: 现在很多人开学了
author: Mihuo3567
txt_content: 现在很多人开学了，包括我的朋友，开学后，你觉得无聊吗？

replies.author: mohui666
replies.txt_content: 确实很无聊。。

replies.author: 胡新锐
replies.txt_content:
mohui666 发表于 2020-5-15 15:54
确实很无聊。。
我觉得不无聊

replies.author: Syro
replies.txt_content: 等自己开学了就不无聊了（确信）

replies.author: qiuzilu
replies.txt_content:
不无聊
那么多被罚写的作业怎么会无聊。。

replies.author: 吹笙花影
replies.txt_content: 无聊啊 都没人一起玩了

replies.author: Muyi_yu
replies.txt_content: 不无聊，挺有趣的

replies.author: 卑微小吴
replies.txt_content: 开学后学业非常紧让你根本没时间停下来无聊~

replies.author: 是叶子呀
replies.txt_content: 很多人都不玩mc了

replies.author: Mihuo3567
replies.txt_content:
1278382004 发表于 2020-5-15 15:55
无聊啊 都没人一起玩了
对啊，我朋友都开学了

replies.author: Mihuo3567
replies.txt_content:
是叶子呀 发表于 2020-5-15 17:23
很多人都不玩mc了
对呀....

replies.author: Blumekranz
replies.txt_content: 今日已经不开学了呀
我们大学绝了，开学不上课就考试，考完直接回家了

replies.author: 曦灬月
replies.txt_content: 不无聊

replies.author: 袁少Gent
replies.txt_content: 挺无聊的qwq

replies.author: xax990819
replies.txt_content: 在宿舍隔离  快乐的一批
我还没有开学=.=

replies.author: hyzgzz
replies.txt_content: 不无聊

replies.author: 北极仙光
replies.txt_content: 学校生活不无聊啊

replies.author: Dragonlitty
replies.txt_content: 害  刚经历过答辩  毕业了都 大人 时代变了

replies.author: z543075006
replies.txt_content: 无聊到长蘑菇了

replies.author: Norteker
replies.txt_content: 我也在等死的路上

replies.author: MC小库
replies.txt_content: 开学还好8 就是没那么多时间上MC了
